name: West Shore Region
address: 549 Seminole Rd Ste 103  Norton Shores MI 49444
general information: The Alzheimer’s Association Chapters provide supportive programs and services to help people with Alzheimer’s and their caregivers deal with the disease and its impact on their lives. Each chapter in our nationwide network offers Information and Referral, Care Consultation, Safety Services, Support Groups and Education. In addition, some chapters offer special programs such as assistance to individuals with Alzheimer’s who live alone, people living with early-onset Alzheimer's, rural and/or multicultural outreach, care coordination services, and training programs for families and professionals.

name: Southwest Region
general information: The Alzheimer’s Association Chapters provide supportive programs and services to help people with Alzheimer’s and their caregivers deal with the disease and its impact on their lives. Each chapter in our nationwide network offers Information and Referral, Care Consultation, Safety Services, Support Groups and Education. In addition, some chapters offer special programs such as assistance to individuals with Alzheimer’s who live alone, people living with early-onset Alzheimer's, rural and/or multicultural outreach, care coordination services, and training programs for families and professionals.
